title: Policy for Information Security
description: Management shall define and maintain an information security policy.

title: Segregation of Duties
description: Duties and responsibilities shall be segregated to reduce opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification.

title: Password Management System
description: A password management system shall be interactive and ensure quality passwords.

title: Classification of Information
description: Information should be classified in terms of legal requirements, value, criticality, and sensitivity.

title: Use of Cryptographic Controls
description: Cryptography shall be used to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity of information.

title: Secure Development Environment
description: Development, testing, and production environments shall be separated and protected.
